excerpt: "The COVID-19 pandemic accelerated a change that was already underway with regards to the digitisation of biopharma marketing – and the increasing ubiquity of omnichannel. It’s a trend that has only been supercharged by recent advances in artificial intelligence. But how is the shift to digital playing out in practice?"
